original_title: Assault: The World's Most Violent Collection of Real Street Fights
overview: Instead of showing you fights bombarded with rules, Indecline offers a cringe-worthy collection of bloody, brutal, and 100 % real brawls and punishing scuffles in which there are absolutely no rules, including head-stomping, karate-kicking, baseball bat bashing and pepper spraying.
title: Assault: The World's Most Violent Collection of Real Street Fights
